instruction: Compose a song with a happy tune and lyrics conveying hopefulness.
output:
(Verse 1)
Life is full of surprises and dreams
Joyful moments and good things
We can make them all come alive
Just keep believing and arrive

(Chorus)
We can make our lives so grand
Go for it and take a stand
We have so much strength inside
Just take the leap and reach high

(Verse 2)
No matter where you come from
No one can ever stop our dreams
Let's keep all hope alive
Nothing can dim our shining light

(Chorus)
We can make our lives so grand
Go for it and take a stand
We have so much strength inside
Just take the leap and reach high

(Bridge)
Dare to dream and rise to the top
We can do anything we want
Look ahead and never give up
Gonna reach out and own our luck

(Chorus x2)
We can make our lives so grand
Go for it and take a stand
We have so much strength inside
Just take the leap and reach high
